# Word2Vec 練習
- ref：
    - https://radimrehurek.com/gensim/models/word2vec.html
    - https://radimrehurek.com/gensim/models/keyedvectors.html
    - https://radimrehurek.com/gensim/auto_examples/tutorials/run_word2vec.html
from google.colab import drive
drive.mount('/content/gdrive')

source: ### 模型的 訓練，儲存，讀取

from gensim.test.utils import common_texts

print(len(common_texts))
print(common_texts[:5])

tokens = []
for t in common_texts:
    tokens += t
print(len(tokens))     #小技巧:  串列變集合: 串列有29個詞，但包含重複的，但轉set就會只留下不重複的部分
print(len(set(tokens))) #不重複的詞

from gensim.models import Word2Vec #google提出的

# 訓練模型
model = Word2Vec(sentences=common_texts, size=150, window=5, min_count=1, workers=4)
#  sentence灌入已分好詞的句子, size為每層神經網路有多大(大W shape= 12*150 ,12是辭典長度(不重複的部分))
#  兩種模式: CBOW 和 SG ，window =5代表下圖 (預設是5)
# min_count意思: 預設值為0，
#vector_size 預設100

# 儲存模型
model.save("word2vec.model")

print(len(model.wv.vocab))  #取用方法wv.vocab 此變數為dict  wv是word2vec

![未命名.jpg](data:image/jpeg;base64,)

from gensim.models import Word2Vec

# 讀取模型
model = Word2Vec.load("word2vec.model")

# 繼續訓練
model.train([["hello", "world"]], total_examples=1, epochs=1) #一樣要丟2 Bi 軸的資料
print(model.wv.vocab) #取用方法wv.vocab 此變數為dict

# 查看某字的向量
vector = model.wv['computer'] #取用方法 model.wv 當作dict用
print(len(vector))

# 查看最相似的詞
model.most_similar('computer') 

#最接近的詞 , 相似度]

source:
# 只存 words 和 embeddings.

from gensim.models import KeyedVectors

word_vectors = model.wv  #將weight存下來 model.wv   若沒.wv,會存成整個model
word_vectors.save("word2vec.wordvectors")

wv = KeyedVectors.load("word2vec.wordvectors", mmap='r') #r =read

vector = wv['computer']
### 英文語料庫

import pandas as pd

csv = '/content/gdrive/MyDrive/AI_&_EdgeComputing_Program/NLP/shared_folder/dataset/imdb/IMDB-Movie-Data.csv'
df = pd.read_csv(csv)

titles = df['Title'].apply(str).tolist()
contents = df['Description'].apply(str).tolist()

docs = contents

print(df.shape)

from gensim.utils import simple_preprocess # simple_preprocess(doc)#幫我們做分詞去標點轉小許去數值等工作
from gensim.parsing.preprocessing import STOPWORDS

tokenized_docs = [[token for token in simple_preprocess(doc) if token not in STOPWORDS] for doc in docs]

from gensim.models import Word2Vec

# 訓練模型
model = Word2Vec(sentences=tokenized_docs, size=100, window=5, min_count=1, workers=4)

# 儲存模型
model.save("word2vec_en.model")

print(len(model.wv.vocab)) #看dictionary裡有少字
model.most_similar('life')

source: ### 中文語料庫

# 讀檔
import pandas as pd
#from google.drive import drive
#drive.mount('content/gdrive)
csv = '/content/gdrive/MyDrive/AI_&_EdgeComputing_Program/NLP/shared_folder/dataset/techorange_ai.csv'
df = pd.read_csv(csv)
#print(df.shape)

titles = df['title'].apply(str).tolist()
contents = df['content'].apply(str).tolist()

docs = contents
print(len(docs))

import jieba #用結巴分詞
import string

tokenized_docs = [[token for token in jieba.lcut(doc) if token.strip() != '' and token.strip() not in string.punctuation] for doc in docs]
print(tokenized_docs[:1])

text:
Building prefix dict from the default dictionary ...
Loading model from cache /tmp/jieba.cache
Loading model cost 0.861 seconds.
Prefix dict has been built successfully.
outputs.name: stderr

source:
from gensim.models import Word2Vec

# 訓練模型
model = Word2Vec(sentences=tokenized_docs, size=100, window=5, min_count=1, workers=4)

# 儲存模型
model.save("word2vec_zh.model")

# 詞彙總數
print(len(model.wv.vocab))

# 儲存詞彙與詞向量 
#特殊用法!!!! 配合google提供的視覺化工具 embedding project
words = []  #放詞的地方
embeddings = [] #放詞向量的地方

for i in range(len(model.wv.vocab)):  #model內有wv, wv有vocab變數，此變數為詞庫內的數量
    w = model.wv.index2word[i] # 取出詞本身放在w內
    v = model.wv[w]  #類似dict用法 但其實他是object
    words.append(w)
    embeddings.append(v)

with open('/content/techorange_ai_embeddings.tsv','w') as f:
    for arr in embeddings:
        #arr = arr.tolist()
        arr = [str(e) for e in arr]
        str1 = '\t'.join(arr) + '\n'  #\t是tab分隔符號
        f.write(str1)

with open('/content/techorange_ai_words.tsv','w') as f:
    f.write('Word\n')
    for w in words:
        f.write(w+'\n')

print('done')

### Embedding Projector
- https://projector.tensorflow.org/
下載

techorange_ai_embeddings.tsv

techorange_ai_ai_words.tsv
